Arrangement.text:
Worship Leader: Shout, and sing for joy, O inhabitant of Zion, For great in your midst is the Holy One of Israel.” (Isaiah 12:6 ESV)
Congregation: I will rejoice and be glad in your steadfast love, Because you have seen my affliction; You have known the distress of my soul, (Psalm 31:7 ESV)
Worship Leader: “Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and will not be afraid; For the LORD GOD is my strength and my song, And he has become my salvation.” (Isaiah 12:2 ESV)
Congregation: “For God so loved the world, That he gave his only Son, That whoever believes in him Should not perish but have eternal life. (John 3:16 ESV)
